context.p: Each service controller is registered with APP. Registration means entering the controller with its ID and its responsible organization in the bssapp database.

After the initial deployment of the oscm-app container, the platform operator can access APP and define the organization responsible for the service controller. This is usually your own organization. However, it may also be another organization with the technology provider role registered with .
You can access the Web interface of APP as follows:

ol.li: In a Web browser, access the base URL of APP, for example, http://127.0.0.1:8880/oscm-app.

li.p: Log in with the ID and password of the user which you received with the confirmation email for your user account or as another administrator of the same organization.

ol.li: Specify the IDs of the service controller (ess.openstack or ess.aws) and of the responsible organization.
Click Save Configuration to save the settings.
